title: Subchapter C - Highway Use And Maintenance
content:
Subchapter C - Highway Use And Maintenance

State Regulations

Part 150 - Advertising Signs Adjacent To The Interstate And Primary Highway Systems (§ 150.1 to 150.18)

Part 151 - Repealed

Part 152 - Repealed

Part 153 - Repealed

Part 154 - Special Hauling Permits (Subpart 154-1 to 154-3)

Part 155 - Traffic Regulations On Restricted Highways (§ 155.1 to 155.8)

Part 156 - Use Of Rest And Parking Areas And Scenic Overlooks (§ 156.1 to 156.13)

Part 157 - Control Of Junkyards And Scrap Metal Processing Facilities Along The Interstate And Primary Highway Systems (§ 157.1 to 157.6)

Part 158 - Covering Loose Cargo (§ 158.1 to 158.4)

Part 159 - Repealed (§ 159.1 to 159.3)

Part 160 - Repealed (§ 160.1 to 160.3)

Part 161 - Repealed

Part 162 - Duties Of County And Town Superintendents Concerning Method Of Construction, Improvement Or Maintenance Of Highways And Bridges (§ 162.1 to 162.3)

Part 163 - Prohibited Activities (§ 163.1 to 163.4)

Part 164 - Traffic Regulations In Highway Work Area (§ 164.1 to 164.8)

Part 165 - Uniform Code Of Bridge Inspection (§ 165.1 to 165.13)

Part 167 - Private Bridge Inventory (§ 167.1 to 167.4)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
